name: Through the Anthill - LD48
description:
Be an ant in the underground of the anthill that needs to find the scattered leaves and take them to the storage places. Look for the best way to cross or dig the blocks of land ahead. Pay attention because digging will tire you out and to recharge your energy you must eat the sweet beans that you find.

I have recently started programming and developing games and this is my first attempt at jamming. Feel free to leave any comments and thanks in advance for playing it.

Arrow keys or A,W,S,D to move. ESC to go back to menu.
